name: enigma-srcs
description: Enigma Framework for Node server aplications

scripts.install:all: npm run install:core && npm run install:orm && npm run install:http && npm run install:rsc && npm run install:cli
scripts.build:all: npm run build:core && npm run build:orm && npm run build:http && npm run build:rsc && npm run build:cli
scripts.pack:all: npm run pack:core && npm run pack:orm && npm run pack:http && npm run pack:rsc && npm run pack:cli
scripts.install:full: npm run install:all && npm run build:all && npm run pack:all
scripts.version:pkg:major: npm run version:core -- major && npm run version:orm -- major && npm run version:http -- major && npm run version:rsc -- major && npm run version:cli -- major && git commit -am ":bookmark: update major version"
scripts.version:pkg:minor: npm run version:core -- minor && npm run version:orm -- minor && npm run version:http -- minor && npm run version:rsc -- minor && npm run version:cli -- minor && git commit -am ":bookmark: update minor version"
scripts.version:pkg:patch: npm run version:core -- patch && npm run version:orm -- patch && npm run version:http -- patch && npm run version:rsc -- patch && npm run version:cli -- patch && git commit -am ":bookmark: update patch version"
scripts.publish:all: npm run publish:core && npm run publish:orm && npm run publish:http && npm run publish:rsc && npm run publish:cli
scripts.outdated:all: npm run outdated:core && npm run outdated:orm && npm run outdated:http && npm run outdated:rsc && npm run outdated:cli

author: snakeful
